###############################################################
#  SeGAInit.tcl -- SeGA initialization file
#  SpecTcl source file: 01016_bdecayspec.cpp
#  Last modified 2004/04/24 by add
#
#  Set SeGA energy calibration variables
#  All intercepts are based on a 13-bit scale
#
#  Labr3 calibration from SRM calibration by ??? 
###############################################################

# 2nd order Labr3 energy calibration parameters 
# (NEED TO BE UPDATED FOR e08020)

16 0.0
